example.name: autogen1
example.text: `` Wilder has managed to get across the idea that Coleman will say anything to get elected governor and -- more important -- has been able to put the onus for all the negative campaigning on Coleman . ''

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Meanwhile , bond investors are laboring under the onus of a national debt ceiling debate .
example.arg: of a national debt ceiling debate
